backupAvailable.description: The database is available for DML prior backup.

drifted.description: The schema is drifted from the source of truth.

effectiveEnvironment.description:
The effective environment based on environment tag above and environment
 tag on the instance. Inheritance follows
 https://cloud.google.com/resource-manager/docs/tags/tags-overview.

environment.description:
The environment resource.
 Format: environments/prod where prod is the environment resource ID.

labels.description: Labels will be used for deployment and policy control.

project.description:
The project for a database.
 Format: projects/{project}
